function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High prevalence of anxiety symptoms in the studies (range from 8.3% to 81.1%)","Impact":"Increased risk of mental health issues and reduced well-being for individuals","Mitigation":"Provide access to mental health resources and support for individuals with anxiety symptoms","Technologies":"Telemedicine platforms for remote mental health support","People":"Participants in the studies","Owner":"Mental health professionals and healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Variability in the definition of anxiety and cut-off points in different studies","Impact":"Inconsistent measurement of anxiety levels, leading to potential misinterpretation of results","Mitigation":"Standardize the definition of anxiety and cut-off points for consistent measurement across studies","Technologies":"Data analysis software for standardized measurement","People":"Researchers and study authors","Owner":"Research institutions and academic organizations"},{"Description":"Association of anxiety with sociodemographic factors like gender, age, occupation, income, and education","Impact":"Unequal distribution of anxiety burden among different demographic groups, potentially exacerbating existing disparities","Mitigation":"Targeted mental health interventions for demographics at higher risk of anxiety","Technologies":"Data analytics for identifying high-risk groups","People":"Policy makers and public health authorities","Owner":"Government agencies and mental health organizations"}]}
